title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin discusses the wild 4th quarter comeback by the Celtics over the Warriors and why Boston was able to steal game 1. He continues his defense of Steph Curry from criticisms following the late game collapse at home in the Finals. He also addresses Dolphins QB Tua Tagovailoa's status heading into next season with a new head coach and better offensive personnel. Plus, young NBA star Tyrese Haliburton joins the show to tell Colin why the Celtics could be the toughest team the Warriors have faced in the Finals during their dynastic run. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
